title: BRING BACK 'LOSS PREVENTED'
body:
EDIT: So as Klavinmour advised me, 'Loss Prevented' was an engine to protect a player from server-side issues and thus hasn't gone anywhere, so now I feel like a bit of a tart. BUT I argue that it'd still be an excellent tool to utilize in PvP as an AFK buffer.
After all server issues AND afk are unfair fields

Additionally as Bunny pointed out one could just leave to save the team in a defeat. However if the afk penalty is severe enough no-one will be willing to make that sacrifice.

-Original post as below, I'm keeping the sarcasm, it fuels me-

The 'Loss prevented' feature in ranked was once the only buffer between your LP and an unfair game situation (In this case, 'AFK'). The system it ran on was 'earnest' at best but in most cases fairly protected your rank and reputation whilst still rewarding the enemy for their (typically lucky) victory. Needed work though, I get that.

But hell to that, bit too much _slight_ tinkering to do to make it function, am I right? Yeah nah lads, scrap it, can't have Entropy and fairness floating around like a day old fart now can we?

Time and time again I've been on the losing end of an AFK, and usually the enemy is very gracious. 9 reports later and I find no action taken on rectifying the issue, with only my LP I had to lose for all the _nothing_ to happen. Neato burrito. So if we don't want to solve individual cases then 'Loss Prevented' is quite literally our only shot.

Hard to program? Too bad. That's what coders are paid for, they love a challenge.

**This is how I suggest it runs;**
TEAM WITH 4 PLAYERS
* Unfair playing field
* Gain NO 'Pity LP' BUT AT THE LEAST don't lose any either (Gosh that almost sounds logical)

TEAM WITH NO AFK
* Free LP yay! LP rates are the same, bad luck is bad luck FREELO bois~

Oooootherwiiise~ Riot Games (as a well established MOBA gaming company) are (as highlighted in this thread and as evident in literally every god damn ranked game ever)
* Removing a logically sound and fairness balancing mechanic (Line 1-2)
* Taking little to no evident action in the current '''''''''method'''''''' of punishing those whom leave the games (Lines 4-6)
* Continuing the Youtube-ranted-ongoing-consistently-ignored-clear-as-day-blatant-issue of punishing the unlucky (Line 5)

If Riot is already working on reviving the system, kudos! I tip my fedora-the-explorer to you. But people of the community; Cmon, seriously we need to add some pressure to this issue, we've aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaall~ experienced it regardless of rank please vote below.

replies.body:
Loss Prevented still exists. I never went anywhere.

It was NEVER for AFKs, it's only use is for server wide issues.

End of story.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7HkeGz9T,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-07T14:05:07.962+0000)
>
> Loss Prevented still exists. I never went anywhere.
> 
> It was NEVER for AFKs, it's only use is for server wide issues.
> 
> End of story.

^

Well then in argument of fairness it should be for afks
-Server issues are an unfair playing field
-But as are 4v5s

^Upgrade baby, it'd boost satisfaction

To further elaborate, 'Loss Prevented' is a system that is enabled when there are widespread issues affecting a large majority of the games playerbase. ie; there are known widespread connectivity issues to the server. (Or other similar issues).

This system is a global switch, if it is enabled then every loss until it is disabled is marked as loss prevented.
But thank you for pointing that out I'd no idea

you're youtube famous.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XZB2BVA8SKs&feature=youtu.be&t=4m34s

Best $3.69 you ever spent.

http://ci.memecdn.com/687/1512687.jpg

$5 AU. But all of NB3's donations are taken in USD.

There are videos out there with my gameplay and not just donations, though none of NB3's channel.

Also why comment on a 3 month old post for this?

It was the only way I could think of to guarantee you saw it as you would get a reply notification. 

Also, have a snickers.

They've looked at this problem in the way of /remake at 3 minutes when you have a disconnect. I know this doesn't really help when you have an AFK in your game after the time period is up but out of 20 games as an example you would be pretty unlucky to get even 1 AFK. I've definitely had days where it feels like I get nothing but leavers but at least in the last 20 games I have had I haven't had one and if I had it was a D/C at 3 minutes to which we could remake.

I think the loss prevention you are talking about could probably be exploited if you knew you were going to lose the game so someone just left for the benefit of the rest of the team. I know it's not highly possible in solo queue but it could definitely happen and the last thing Riot would want is to have their features exploited for personal gain. The only gain they want is how big their wallets are becoming.

Loss prevention is typically only used in cases where this is a significant amount of people have connection issues. To which Riot will activate Loss Prevention because it is a problem with their servers.
But if the AFKer got a heafty penalty then no-one would be willing to make the sacrifice

Unfortunately it is still too easily abuseable. You can simply queue with a friend who is playing on a smurf and does not care about any penalty for that account.

This is why it is so difficult for Riot to address these kinds of issues, because while an idea like yours looks great from the perspective of those who would use it properly, Riot also has to consider those who will abuse it. 

Remake as it is is still abuseable, it can be used in the same way to avoid bad matchups like vsing someone you know is better than you or who stomped you last game, but the risk/negatives are far outweighed by the positives, unfortunately in the system you are suggesting the same is not true.

Riot needs to do more. I still say they need to implement a personal scoring system, than even in those 1v5 games (Yes, I have had them) we will still be enticed to finish out the game, get better stats than your team, and hopefully get a positive LP/MMR/Scorecard at the end.

It is, just, ugh at how Riot handle there issues, as if there are none, yeh they don't do anything.

Here is a list of the retarded moments of late:

* My friend quit because you didn't gank his lane
* Player 1 - "You didn't ban Kat and now she is carrying", Player 2 (first pick in Dominion) - "You are not carrying either", Player 1 - "I am still doing better than you"
* Very next game I take Kat, carry my team, Lee quit on the enemy team.
* Ban Fizz... proceeds not to ban Fizz, Fizz carries (Summoners Rift)
* Let's swap lanes, I didn't expect XX champ to be mid... instantly feeds top lane twice in 2 minutes, blames me for not being able to kill mid
* Sorry I was AFK, I had to do a massive shit (By this point in Dominion our Nexus just clicked over 50% damage), proceeds to say there is no issue since it is a fun game mode

And not to mention all the random AFK's for whatever fucktard reason.

Now you may think some of these issues cannot be stopped? Wrong, you implement a personal scoring system so for those who actually try in each game mode and are there for the whole time will gain something out of it.
Pretty please? I'll be your best friend.
